outputs.output_descr:
To promote educational innovation trough a pedagogical alliance with recognized civic society organizations (NGOs) and the Minister of Public Education (SEP). These NGOs must be specialized in  Mexican youth and their rights .
To guarantee full development of educational potentialities and citizenship identity   of young people (age 15 to 18) enrolled on middle-high educational public establishments in Mexico in order to improve a whole development of the students, to decrease the scholastic drop out, to facilitate them to face risk situations and to build a life project.
outputs.output_title: APOYO JOVENES  NIV MED SUP DES

project_descr: Apoyo a los y las jóvenes del nivel medio superior para el desarrollo de su proyecto de vida y la Prevención de Riesgos.
project_title: APOYO JOVENES  NIV MED SUP DES PROY D VIDA Y PREV RIESGO
